main event: A civilian in Sun Valley, California reported observing a cigar-shaped object traveling at high speed across the sky in a nearly straight line from N.E. to S.W. during the late night and early morning hours in the winter of 1948.
interesting points: The US Air Force had a 'Project Saucer' which involved a systematic investigation of reports of strange missiles or discs in the sky all over the United States.
The air forces prepared a hush-hush questionnaire for anyone in the air forces who claimed to have seen a 'saucer' as part of 'Project Saucer'.
About 40 percent of the 270 investigated cases remained unexplained by the Air Force, leaving a question mark behind them.
Some of the reported discs were observed at high altitudes, with some as high as 40,000 feet.
One national guard pilot died while pursuing some discs that were flying too high.
sighted object: cigar-shaped object traveling at high speed with a blue-green and white pattern of exhaust
photographs: no, the report includes no photographs
